abstract: A conversation on the Republican presidential landscape, without Chris Christie. Also, a report from Capitol Hill on the changed dynamic between President Obama and Eric Cantor.
snippet: A conversation on the Republican presidential landscape, without Chris Christie. Also, a report from Capitol Hill on the changed dynamic between President Obama and Eric Cantor.
lead_paragraph: A conversation on the Republican presidential landscape, without Chris Christie. Also, a report from Capitol Hill on the changed dynamic between President Obama and House Majority Leader Eric Cantor.

headline.main: Caucus Video: Post-Christie Campaign Landscape; The Obama-Cantor Dynamic
